original_title: Stroop: Journey into the Rhino Horn War
overview: Two first-time filmmakers stop their lives to find out why rhinos are being killed for their horns. Carving out six months for the project, the women quickly find themselves immersed in a world far larger and more dangerous than they had imagined, only emerging from their odyssey four years later.
title: Stroop: Journey into the Rhino Horn War
